Uses of Class
cc.mallet.classify.Classification

  • Packages that use Classification 
    Package Description
    cc.mallet.classify
    Classes for training and classifying instances.
    cc.mallet.pipe
    Classes for processing arbitrary data into instances.
    cc.mallet.share.upenn
    Utilities that currently include a command line wrapper for the maxent classifier.
    cc.mallet.types
    Fundamental MALLET types, including FeatureVector, Instance, Label etc.
    de.unifrankfurt.cs.acoli.akkad.methods.segmentation.stat
    Classes implementing statistically based segmentations.
